comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: A sad story: "The body of Elliott Marshall, the young lawyer who disappeared from his office at 48 Wall Street last Thursday, was washed ashore near Port Monmouth" — New York Times, 30 July 1914 Apparently he got married only a year earlier: 'Elliott Marshall to Wed.‎" — New York Times, 18 March 1913

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks so much trialsanderrors for citing both of these stories about the life and sad end of this young lawyer.
